bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for the Application of Faulted Circuit Indicators on Distribution Circuits
IEEE Guide for the Application of Faulted Circuit Indicators on Distribution Circuits
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 1610-2016 (Revision of IEEE Std 1610-2007) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Information on what a faulted circuit indicator (FCI) is designed to do, along with methods for selecting and applying FCIs for 200 / 600 A distribution circuits are described in this application guide.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
